reference: Martin Feldstein, The Importance of Temporary Layoffs: An Empirical Analysis, Brookings Papers on Economic Activity, 1975:3, pp. 725-744. Milton Friedman, The Role of Monetary Policy, American Economic Review, vol. 58, pp. 1-15, March 1968.
